u.a: Gia runs into living room with musical television that her uncle had brought for her
<1w> Gia takes book from toy bag and giving it to Lois <5w> Gia taking another book from bag
Gia points to piece of scotch tape on book
Mommy is ready to leave , Gia running to door , opens door
Gia putting man in car
Gia opens up book which she and Lois use as a tunnel , puts opened book on end
Gia tries to connect two train cars , can't
Gia and Lois push train , it buckles and comes apart .
Gia going toward "Animal" book , picking up bendable man on the way
Gia running to bedroom , pulls her bike out and gets on it .
going to orange chair
Lois attaches paper to clipboard and puts it on table , Gia draws
Gia has tried on new jacket , Mommy starts to unbutton it , Gia pulls away
Gia hears children shouting in hall
scribbles on toy pan
Gia writes on her stomach
Lois is sitting on orange chair ready to read book to Gia , Gia pointing to tape recorder
Gia reassembles book "bridge"
putting red disk on slide
Gia going to mirror block
painting with glack paint
putting brush in blue paint
painting on big piece of paper on wall
wipes her hands with washcloth , putting cloth back
<1w> pointing to small ball in picture <5w> pointing to big ball in picture
gives long pencil to Lois , takes Lois's shorter pencil
Gia is pretending that she's going to Jeffrey's house
Gia "feeds" lamb
takes slide from toy bag
taking bendable man from bag
taking "Animals" book from toy bag
holds up tank car
pointing to book on record player cabinet
pointing to Gia's navel
responds
holding up jacket
looking at picture of father waving goodbye to rest of family
holding lamb up to lois
holding up mommy figure
Lois jus arrived , Gia running intto bedroom
Gia hears children in hallway , runs to door and kicks it
pointing to book "bridge"
Gia and Lois are painting , Lois reaches for brush , Gia pulls it back . Gia paints
Gia is sitting on train , Lois pushes it , stops , Gia tries to move train herself
<aft> then opens it
Lois had taken pencil from Gia because she had drawn on the counter
Lois is sitting on bench , Gia tries to get on
<aft> tries to put it on
Gia hears a knock at the door , running to door
Gia holding pencil up
Lois takes pencil from Gia , but Gia takes it back
Gia putting car driver in truck
mommy puts on her coat
Gia trying to fit train cars together
Gia sets man on train , while attaching another car to train , man falls and she replaces man on train
taking man and car to bridge
rides her bike , falls
stands on large toy dog
straddles toy train , sitting on it .
Lois goes over to couch , Gia sits on couch with book
Gia pointing out window
<bef> Gia pushes car and driver under book tunnel , man falls under tunnel
responding
<bef> Gia pushes car under bridge , it falls onto car
pointing to car
looks for dump car and finds it
goes to get bottle which is on window ledge next to piece of cookie
pointing out window
Gia and Lois are sitting on couch , Gia drinking here bottle
Gia looking out window at children on play+ground
pointing to doll she put on couch
Gia crumpling a plastic+wrapped shirt
Gia tries to lift toy bag
opens book to last page
pointing to last empty coupling on train
response
trying to wind up mechanical car
taking matches from box
runs into bedroom , returning with dry diaper
reaching for dish of pretzels , whining
tries to put lamb in block , can't
<bef> Gia puts all figures on form board
Gia taking figures off
trying to open bedroom door
response
pointing to empty space on form board
pointing to rabbit in a picture
child shouts in the hall outside , Gia listens
<bef> her painting set falls on floor , Gia bends to retrieve it , sees her toycar and picks it up
looking into toy bag
Gia looking out window
Mommy is walking into building response
Gia pushes car into book bridge
response going into kitchen
Gia trying to attach engine to wrong end of train
taking it to opposite end
runs into living room carrying musical tv
sitting on her bike
pointing to computer printout "Happy Birthday" on wall that her uncle gave her
starts toward Lois
Gia climbing off couch , gets bottle
Lois points to miniature straw hat of Gia's
response
Mommy takes Gia's spring coat from box
Gia pulling toy bagf toward door
Gia picks up pencil Lois had left in Gia's house the previous day
Lois is sitting on Gia's chair
Gia takes clown from tly bag , taking out second clown
Gia riding her bike over toys
Lois had drawn balloon , Gia scribbles , pointing to scribble
Gia starting to scribble again
Lois winds beads around Gia's neck , beads become undone
Lois bounces Gia on her knees , pretending to be washing machine , stops
Lois and Gia had played with the slide earlier , Gia pulling slide from bag
Gia puts lamb into block because it's cold . picking up second lamb
Gia completes form board , Lois about to dump figures out , Gia pulls it back
response
Gia holds out arm for Lois to pinch it , Lois does , Gia giving Lois other arm
reaches into laundry cart for her overalls
spills milk on floor
Gia starts to draw on counter , Lois trying to take pencil from Gia
Gia looking at picture of train in book
Lois opens book , Gia reaching for it
Mommy putting jacket on Gia
holding lamb
Lois is in kitchen , Gia runs into kitchen , gets in her highchair
Gia at crib , doll is inside
pointing to empty coupling on train .
looking around for car driver
Gia and Lois are reading book , picture of baby sleeping
looking around
